mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sales(sales_num, user_num, recipe_num, sales_date, sales_qty, sales_source_num) VALUES (sales_Num_seq.nextval, #{userNum}, #{recipeNum}, #{salesDate}, #{salesQty}, #{salesSourceNum})
mapper.select: SELECT sales_source_num, sales_source_name FROM sales_source ORDER BY sales_source_num

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, p.* FROM( ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT s.sales_date, s.sales_source_num, u.user_name, SUM(s.sales_qty * r.recipe_price) tp, SUM(SUM(s.sales_qty * r.recipe_price)) OVER (PARTITION BY sales_date) AS TOTAL FROM sales s, user_info u, recipe r WHERE s.user_num = u.user_num (+) AND s.recipe_num = r.recipe_num(+) GROUP BY s.sales_date, s.sales_source_num, u.user_name ) PIVOT ( SUM(TP) FOR sales_source_num IN ( 1 as nvl1, 2 as nvl2, 3 as nvl3, 4 as nvl4, 5 as nvl5, 6 as nvl6, 7 as nvl7, 8 as nvl8 ) ) ORDER BY sales_date DESC ) p ) ) srp WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo } AND #{endNo } ORDER BY rnum

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, rsrs.* FROM ( SELECT s.*, ss.sales_source_name, u.user_name, r.recipe_name, r.recipe_price, (r.recipe_price * s.sales_qty) tp FROM sales s, user_info u, recipe r, sales_source ss WHERE sales_date LIKE '%' || TO_DATE(#{salesDate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') || '%' AND s.recipe_num = r.recipe_num(+) AND s.user_num = u.user_num(+) AND s.sales_source_num = ss.sales_source_num (+) ORDER BY s.sales_date DESC, s.sales_source_num ASC, s.recipe_num ASC ) rsrs order by rnum )
SELECT count(*) FROM SALES WHERE sales_date = #{salesDate}

SELECT * FROM sales s, user_info u, recipe r, sales_source ss WHERE sales_num = #{salesNum} AND s.user_num = u.user_num (+) AND s.recipe_num = r.recipe_num (+) AND s.sales_source_num = ss.sales_source_num (+)

SELECT * FROM sales s, user_info u, recipe r, sales_source ss WHERE sales_date = #{salesDate} AND s.user_num = u.user_num (+) AND s.recipe_num = r.recipe_num (+) AND s.sales_source_num = ss.sales_source_num (+) ORDER BY s.sales_num
